sub_title: SAFe Scrum Master, RTE/STE,  Enterprise Architect, Program/Project Manager, Business Analyst, Data Scientist, R&D/IT/BSS/OSS Technology Consultant, Software Developer, Mobile IP and Security Expert
summary:
• SAFe Scrum Master STE/RTE (PI planning, ART/ST, I&A Review, System/Solution Demo)
• Enterprise/Solution Architect (Strategy & Roadmap, Architecture, Landscape evolution)
• Business Analyst (Business Case - Acceptance Test Plan - BPMN, UML, Use Case)
• IT, R&D Project and Program Manager (Change Management - Roll out - Delivery)
• Technology Consultant (R&D)
• Scrum Master practitioner & coach (Roles, Artifacts, Ceremonies, Values) Feature/Release Backlog)
• Developer Java, Go, Python/C++/C/Assembly
• DevOps/SecOPS/NEtOPS
• Telecoms, Network, System Architect & Administrator
• Solution & Security Architect 
Training & Development:
• User Story for Scrum/SAFe backlogs
• DEMO
Competences  :
• Built R&D products and services with a short Time To Market timeline
• IoT, Multi-Bearer 5G/4G Networks, Wifi/WiGig, pioneer 
• Designer BSS/OSS/IT/CRM/NMS/ solutions
• Building Turnkey Mobile Telecom and fixed VoIP, Video Over IP, and IMS Services  from scratch
• Built international and national broadcasting networks (like Globecast), serving millions of people.
• Manage multi-billion projects, multinational teams of up to 50 persons, and bids up to 30 concurrent subcontracting companies
• Produce effective solutions in very complex environments that include heterogeneous systems, multi-tenant organizations, and competitive pressure
• Prioritize, and highlight the risks management & problems analysis 
• Provide expert judgment, and suggest new strategies for problem-solving in an efficient manner 
• Urbanisation of IT, OSS, BSS, and CRM infrastructure using TOGAF, eTOM, and Anthology Methodology
• Hands-on experience and expertise in IP and IMS-based solutions with relevant implementations at large 5G/4G, Wifi operators, and ISPs  
• Provide best practices to the client, leading change management with appropriate steering up methodology (Prince2, ITIL, KPI, Balanced Score Board), process optimization (Lean 6 Sigma)
• Service Delivery Management - Change Management
• Optimize Services and Products Life Cycle Management
• Commit to Customer Engagement and Satisfaction 
• Mobile & fixed Network, and Satellite design, with Broadcast Services (Triple play)
• Supporter of 3GPP, NGN, ESTI, CERT, ISO
• Solution designer of IP, LTE, IMS, EPC, CSFB/SRVCC, VoLTE,  SIP, FemToCell, VoIP, Video Over IP   
• Mobile Services & backhauling: SDN, MPLS, Mobile IP 

Offering consulting services in:
• Western Europe (France, Belgium, Netherlands, Spain, UK, Germany,  ...)
• Eastern Europe (Croatia,  Estonia, Romania, Bulgaria, Latvia, ...)
• Asia: China,  South Korea, Myanmar

awards.title: Community Manager
awards.description:
... slightly twisting the meaning of this field, I'm honored to have accumulated a fraction of international wisdom while traveling around the Globe and interacting with people from various cultures:
- Εν οίδα, ότι ουδέν οίδα(Greek) [ik weet dat ik niets weet!]
- De wetten van het land gelden niet op volle zee(Dutch)
- Egotism is an alphabet of one letter(Scottish)
- Ærlighed varer længst(Danish)
- Må även den andra parten höras(Swedish)
- Kein Rauch ohne Feuer(Swiss)
- La calma è la virtù dei forti(Italian)
- Görünen köy kılavuz istemez(Turkish)
- Der Knochen kommt nicht zum Hund, sondern der Hund zum Knochen(German)
- à cœur vaillant rien d’impossible (French)
- El que quiere baile, que pague músico(Spanish)
- Bonjou se paspò ou(Haitian)

profile_positions.description:
As a SAFe Scrum Master, I can coach enterprises (Leaders and Teams) to become more Lean and Agile using the SAFe Enterprise Framework best practices so that they can create sustainable value by developing Products, Solutions, Enablers, Capabilities, Features, and Quality Softwares Releases. 
• Facilitate the SAFe STE/RTE ceremonies (PI Planning, Solution/System Demo, Pl Review, Innovation Planning) and manage artifacts (EPIC, Feature, Software Release, NFRs Backlogs, WSJF, Kanban, System/Solution PSI) 
• Support, design, and optimize the CE/CI/CD solutions architectures:  
   * E2E MaaS, IaaS, PaaS, CaaS, FaaS, SaaS, Fabric-aaS Target Architecture 
   * E2E Service Architecture Modelisation / Workflows and Processes (BPMN/UML/Use Cases )
• Design of the testbed and Proof Of Concept Solutions with NFVI solutions and microservices. 
• Write the specifications of the hardware, firmware, software, and services: epic, feature, user stories, the system uses cases, and acceptance test cases BDD, TDD.
• Define the KPI for the End Customer and the OLA-SLA of the Shared Managed Services
• Realize R&D Audit/Assessment, Survey, and Specification Design (Epic, Features, US) for a new set of IoT appliances and NFVi solutions for  : 
   * Billing and accounting services (Micro Payment)
   * 3D Signage,  Triple Play Application Servers, Gateway and Modem Cable  
   * Lora Appliances,  FemtoCell, Auto Configuration Servers
   * Service Devices Management Software (Saas) 
   * Wifi 6, LTE (4G/5G) residential gateways 
   * VoIP/Video Over IP Services, IMS Services
   * Managed Services (Paas) Solutions.
• Define the criteria for choosing the suppliers to build the software/hardware solutions.
• Follow up on the different software and hardware integrators' software versioning/patch 
Result: Delivery of Software Releases and roadmap for Mobile 3D Innovation Sticks/IOT introduction on the European Market. 
Offer a testbed for the upcoming project's Multi-tenant ReST API testbed.
profile_positions.title: Consulting Information Technology Specialist, SAFe Scrum Master - RTE/STE

profile_positions.description:
• SAFe Framework Coach and Practitioner, Servant Leader, impediments remover
• SAFe STE/RTE ART/ST (Agile Release Train and Solution Train) :
  + Ceremonies management (PI planning, Solution/System Demo,  PI Review, I&A) 
  + Artifacts management( Solution Intent, Solution/Release/PI Backlog, NRFs, Kanban maps, WSJF)
• Scrum Master ceremonies (Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, Sprint Introspection) and artifacts (Product Backlog (User Story), Sprint backlog, StoryPoint, Burndown/Burnup chart, Team Velocity, Product Increment)
• Collaborate with Solution Manager, Solution Architect, Solution Engineer 
• Collaborate with Enterprise Architect, Epic Owner, Product Manager
• Contribute to strategic Themes, Portfolio vision, Kanban, Portfolio Backlog, Lean Budgets, Epic, Enabler,  • Development Value Streams, solution, KPIs
• Scrum and SAFe Coaching, GitHub, DevOps
• BPMN V2 and UML V2, Use Cases Specifications
• Specified the new Multi-Bearer equipment compatible with 4G/5G LTE, Wifi 5G, and WiGig networks :
• Reviewed Multi-Bearer License Deposits and state of the art of Multi-Bearer technologies.
• Written the user stories, the system use cases, functional and non-functional requirements (sculped), and constraints for the introduction of technologies of multi-bearer solutions.
• Prototyped and specified a Multi-Bearer Solution
• Developed and Implemented a testbed and demonstration platform for telecom, network, system equipment, and Multi-Bearer Appliances connected over  LTE 5G and WiFi 5G private and public safety operators network. 
• Written and Designed the High Level and End2End detailed  Service architecture 
• Design the Software DevOps Containerized solution environment 
Result:  Built the internal demonstrator and training of the Marketing services of Thales by the R&D services. Built a new software prototype of the Multi-Berear appliance to be manufactured in China to increase business development and make Thales the leader in this domain
profile_positions.title: Technologies Consultant Adviser and R&D Enterprise Architect, Scrum/SAFe Master (Alten)

profile_positions.description:
• Written the Scrum Project Charter, User Stories, System Use Cases during the Conception, Build/Code, Release and Run phases of each subproject supporting the 
Update of the NFVi VoIP Virtualized Infrastructure Solution of Orange International Call Center without interruption of service using a Software Automated Migration of the M4/M5 Blades and 4000 Virtual Machines (UCS Refresh Solution: New Hardware, firmware, and Software)
Internal Business Units Portfolio as Scrum RTE/STE
• Written the RFI, RFP for building each Agile Software Solution for the Business Units 
• Proofreading of the RFP Solution carried out by the Orange Business Service integrator for each Sofware Development subproject 
• Built the migration planning of the Technical Home Assistance for Mass Market, SOHO market, Professional and Small Enterprises with respect of scope, delay, cost, and quality on this newly updated services using the new Software Solution 
• Studied and analyzed the migration of the Technical Assistance Home GP (Public) and Pro/SME (SOHO) and passed the funding and architecture committees to launch the project
• Prepared PI Planning, daily Scrum Stand-Up, Iteration Solution/Demo Review, Iteration Retrospective, Innovation Planning, and update Portfolio Value Stream and architecture highway 
• Participated in the preparation of operational and funding committees during subproject launch or risk/crisis committees
• Elaborated, reported, and monitored Key Performance Indicators (KPI: Velocity, WSJF, IFPUG, ...)
• Managed Resource allocation (competence and cost)
• Participated in the subproject launch and produced the project documentation and test
Results: Succeeded to define an Automated Software Base Migration (M2 Blade Blade M4/M5 and 4000 virtual machines) without disruption of services.  Made the budget for AT Home been approved by Orange France Corporate to migrate all the Call Center on this new VoIP Call Center SAFe Agile service

profile_positions.description:
ORGANISATION: Telecoms / Orange New Mail
Specification and Certification of the Legal Obligation services in the Orange New Mail messaging services for mobile and fixed network users (30 million users).

ROLE : Security R&D Architect
EXPERTISE : Built R226 folder and documents to Obtain R226 certifications as a solution Manufacturer and as Integrator (Orange's first R226 certification).
ACTIVITIES :
• Elaborated the R226 files and folders for the Newmail Service
• Specifications and development of the solution of Legal Obligation V1
• Defined the E2E Security Business Model and Processes of the Legal Obligation Services
• Defined the security target architecture over an NFVi solution.
• Defined the High-Level Design and Detail Design solution of the Legal Obligation Services.
• Elaborated the Technical Architecture File Folder (DAT).
• Elaborated the Engineering File (DIT) 
• Creation and Tracking of Access to Platforms automated procedures (DMI).
• Defined the Traffic Model (Traffic Model Management)
• Wrote the Acceptance Test Plan related to the General Specifications and Technical Report of Legal Obligation Services.
• Wrote the Qualification process or the Legal Obligation Services
• Definition of the Functional recipe of the legal obligation services.
• Participated to the Pre-production and Production load test.
• Definition of the best strategy of the evolution of the Legal Obligations Release Roadmap
• Update the Architecture the V1.2 and V2 releases with the ANSSI's returns
• Designed the target architecture
• Defined the roadmap and changes request.
• Reviewed the security and safety of the overall solution.
• Wrote the technical support and user manuals and associated operating procedures for the definition of a new service of Legal Obligations.
RESULTS :		
Succeeded to obtain both R226 certifications Builder and Integrator (Orange's first R226 Certification) before the launch of the service.

profile_positions.description:
ASSIGNMENT: defined the strategy of the Enterprise Architecture evolution for the current IT Landscape for Belgacom - Proximus for the next 3 years after the merge of both entities.
EXPERTISE: IT Landscape End to End BluePrint, Enterprise Strategy, and Roadmap, Audit and Recommendations, KPI, Service SLA, Roadmap definition for 3 years technologies introduction and evolution Planning 

ACTIVITIES :		
• Gathered the pain points, exigencies, and requirements for the functional block of Opportunity Management, Quote Management, Order Entry, Order processing, Customer Information Management,  Product Life Cycle Management, Pre Sell & Sell (CRM), Order Execution Management, Billing, Reporting and analysis to elaborate the IT Agenda V2.1 
• Realised the SWOT evaluation of the IT Landscape
• Precise the Scoping and define the evolution strategy of the IT Agenda with the IT, Marketing and Salesforce Services of Belgacom/Proximus 
• Defined and Made signed a mutually agreed OLA/SLA and engagement based on KPI for merged IT Services for the next 3 years.
• Provided the High-Level BluePrint of IT Agenda V2.1
• Adapted the ITIL/eTOM framework related to the Idea To Market, Lead To Delivery, Trouble To Resolution, Delivery To Cash Processes of the company with the right service transition, service change management
• Modified the management and change request processes based on the ITIL model.
• Elaborated the financial analysis, strategies and actions plan to join the target architecture and to support the new processes and streams introduced in the organization.

RESULTS:
• Evaluation of Global Cost and ROI per portfolio for the 3 years Plan of Belgacom IT
• Elaboration of IT Agenda V2.1 requirements and Hi-Level BluePrint
• Provided the Technologie Roadmap for integration of Multi CRM Solution BCI, SaleForce, PEGA, AMDOCS, SALTO, Huawei CRM
• Had the commitment of the workers in the new merged services to fulfill this global objective.
profile_positions.title: Technology and Enterprise architect consultant (Altran Netherlands)

profile_positions.description:
As a global leader in innovation and high‐tech engineering consulting, Altran accompanies its clients in the creation and development of their new products and services. Altran's Innovation Makers have been providing services for thirty years to key players in the Aerospace, Automotive, Energy, Railways, Finance, Healthcare, and Telecoms sectors. 

My assignment as an Innovation Technology Consultant was to review every stage of project development for Altran's clients from strategic planning to, conception, design, build, and delivery of new appliances and services, base on the capitalization on the Group’s technological know-how in five key areas: Intelligent Systems, Product Development, Lifecycle Experience, Mechanical Engineering, and Information Systems.

Role includes:
• Satisfy Customer Engagement
• Increase Business Development
• Support Consultancy to end-clients
• Improve Internal Processus
• Training Internal Consultants
• Build R&D internal services (apply State Tax reduction and refunding strategy)
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Technology Consultant - Architect Mobile/Telcoms/IT/OSS/BSS - Project/Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
Founded in France in 1982 on two ideas: promote innovation as a decisive differentiator for companies, and offer the ability to mobilize the best talent as a condition of success to lead and support this innovation. Altran has established itself quickly as the leader in its industry by inventing the innovation technology consulting trade.

As a Lead Project Manager/Lead Architect interested in the evolution of IP technologies and their security aspects regarding the advantages that they bring to the enterprises that successfully securely introduced them in their specific client-oriented offers.  I have to launch and lead innovative services for operators, ISP, private and administrative corporate, and manage their offers to the end-user clients.  I succeeded to combine my interest in R&D for IP technologies development and Information System evolution strategy by defining a set of methodologies and best practices, from idea to market, lead to cash products and services providing an optimal Life Cycle Management process. This relevant methodology allows to reduce time to market and cost implementation for the introduction of these new technologies in State Administration and Private Companies from the Product and Technologie introduction phases and the following conception, design, development, integration, build, run, and maintenance phase. I am keen on introducing such methodologies into enterprise architecture evolution, strategy, and roadmap. I successfully supported change management processes in many companies that helped to improve the service quality for the end-users and improve organizational effectiveness for IT, CRM, Billing, BSS, OSS Information Systems.

Role includes:
• Satisfy Customer Engagement
• Increase Business Development
• Support Consultancy to end-clients
• Improve Internal Processus
• Training Internal Consultants
• Build R&D internal services (apply State Tax reduction and refunding strategy)
profile_positions.title: Program/Project Manager, Enterprise Architect (Mobile, Telecoms, Network, System, IT)

profile_positions.location: France, Reunion, Turkmenistan, US, Spain, Belgium, Germany
profile_positions.description:
Segime has anticipated the growing need for technological innovations in all major industries by conciliating the new economic and technology evolution challenges of their clients with the skills that and know-how that provide its multidisciplinary teams, multisectoral talented consultants and enperienced engineers.

Segime was keen on designing new products and services to optimize the information systems and associated business processes. Segime offers a unique approach at the heart of innovative solutions, business expertise, providing new technologies and tailored consulting engament for key success.

As a lead architect and project manager focused on performance and innovation, a strategic partner of major industries, my role was to support Segime's international customers in their globalization process to operate with excellence their great critical and international projects using Segime best practices, normalisation and industrialisation methodologies.

I have also to provide and support our client training and certification within Segime training and certification organization process and university.

Role includes:
• Satisfy Customer Engagement
• Increase Business Development
• Support Consultancy to end-clients
• Improve Internal Processus
• Training Internal Consultants
• Build R&D internal services (apply State Tax reduction and refunding strategy)

ACTIVITIES : 
• Build the  End to End BluePrint with the target architecture  of the 4G roll out

• Follow the bid of the suppliers for the Single Ran, IMS, EPC, Wifi, Smalcell RFQs, and OSS, BSS adaptation, and CRM integration bids.

and Billing)

RESULTS :

• Review, creation, and Optimization of processes for the new LTE services for 4G services MVNO, MNO, MVNI.

profile_positions.description:
ASSIGNMENT: GDF-SUEZ wanted to define the best strategy for the group to deploy VoIP, video conferencing, and telepresence services around the world with all the best security policies activated. 

The main objectives of the assignment were to :
•	Provide the State of the art for high secured VoIP and Video conferencing for the Head Quarter, Branches, Affiliates, and subsidiaries of new B3G 
•	Realise a global Architecture review and design of VoIP and video conferencing network 
•	Propose the best practice and recommendations for the Integration with the international backbone of video conferencing and telepresence
•	Roadmap and financial analysis of action plan to join the target architecture

EXPERTISE: Unified Communication Project Manager – Security Architect 
		
ACTIVITIES :		
•	Validation of architecture advice to define the Network roadmap evolution for Unified Communication Services and telepresence
•	Elaboration of financial analysis and action plan to join the target unified architecture

RESULTS :		
•	Development of a successful coherent Unified Communication roll out, providing an End to End BluePrint for the target architecture and the breakdown to succeed to reach this milestone following an agreed roadmap between the internal services
•	Redaction of the business case for the VoIP, Video Conference, Telepresenceand unified communication services.
•	Provide secure requirements for a hardened and secured solution for the Next Generation Video Conferencing services based on VPN network (VRF/VRF Lite)

•	Hands-on and Administration load Balancers: F5 Big-IP, ALTEON,
•	Virtualization system : VMware/ESX,  Microsoft Hyper-V Server, XenServer, Cisco UCS, Virtual Box

•	Review and optimization of Webex, Skype, Ms. Lync services
